full_summary:
### Tender Notice

#### Solicitation Number
* W8485-247736/A

#### Publication Date
* 2023-07-31

#### Tender Closing Date
* 2023-08-15T14:00:00

#### Amendment Number
* 1

#### Expected Contract Date
* 2023-08-16 to 2024-03-29

#### Goods or Services
* Parachutes and Associated Equipment (GSIN: N1670B)

#### Description
The Department of National Defence invites bidders to submit proposals for the supply of parachutes and associated equipment. Deliveries are to be made to the Canadian Army Airborne Warfare Centre at CFB Trenton by October 2023.

#### Tender Status
This tender opportunity is closed as it was expired since August 15th, 2023.

#### Contracting Entity
The contracting entity for this procurement is:
* Department of National Defence (DND)
* Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0K2, Canada

#### Contact Person
If you have any questions or require further information, please contact Dany Lebel at:
* Email: [dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca)
* Telephone: (000) 000-0000

#### Documents
The tender notice can be found here: 
* English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7738/w8485-247736-a-acan-en.pdf>
* French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7738/w8485-247736-a-acan-fr_0.pdf> 
**Please ensure you review the tender notice and instructions carefully before submitting your proposal.**

#### Regional Information
* Tender opportunity valid for: Canada
* Delivery is requested to: Canadian Army Airborne Warfare Centre at CFB Trenton


## Attachments

Please note that this procurement is currently expired and closed. Any submissions after the deadline of August 15th 2023 will not be accepted. 

Please check the Government of Canada's procurement registry for any current or upcoming opportunities for your business. 

You can do this by visiting their website at [buyandsell.gc.ca](http://buyandsell.gc.ca) and signing up for a free account.
